p: The Bayesian skyline plots of HAV effective population size were built by genotype IA. A growth by degrees for genotypes IA infection number was estimated with two exponential growth events around 1940 and 1975, up to the peak around 1998 and then a strong decreasing after 2005 ( S2 Fig). The lowering of infection number after 2005 could be consistent but also significant reducing hepatitis A incidence rates by universal immunization of children with hepatitis A vaccine from mid-1990s [ 61].
